data.meta_description: Our recommendations for homes on golf courses in Myrtle Beach, and links to search for Myrtle Beach golf condos.
data.text:
Myrtle Beach Golf Course Homes

Have you ever walked out on your back porch with your morning coffee and gazed at an expansive view of perfectly manicured green grass carpet...with flowers blooming, palmetto trees waving in the breeze, and the smell of magnolias or dogwood in the air?

If you lived in a Myrtle Beach golf course home, this would be a familiar sight to you. Whether you play the game or just want an awe-inspiring, peaceful, and often secure neighborhood, you'll find a lot to love when you choose to live in a golf community.

Myrtle Beach and the Grand Strand have an average of 100 plus golf courses at any given time, and most all of them have homes and condos woven into the plan. Many are gated, and offer a safety factor you won't find in any other location. Homes can range from the very finest multi-million dollar mansions to golf condos you can buy for under $100,000. Many are outside city limits and offer a much lower property tax and insurance rate, although the ones close to the beach will have amenities that can bring a good rental income if you want that.

In a word, the variety of homes on a golf course in Myrtle Beach are endless, and all you need to do is tell us what you have in mind. We can just about guarantee that perfect property is waiting patiently for you to find it.

Below are some distinctions we can offer if you'd like to do the groundwork search yourself:

Luxury Golf Course Homes

Grande Dunes Homes (on and near the beach)

Homes in The Dunes Club (on and near the beach)

Prince Creek Homes for Sale

Search All Golf Course Condos in Myrtle Beach

Myrtlewood Golf Villas

Yacht Club Villas at Barefoot

Barefoot Resort Condos and Townhomes

Give us a call and we'll give you some ideas of the best places to find a golf course home at the beach that best fits your lifestyle and your budget. We've been around a long time and we know what will be your perfect home or condo!
